title: The English rogue described, in the life of Meriton Latroon, a witty extravagant Being a compleat discovery of the most eminent cheats of both sexes. Licensed, January 5. 1666.
author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?
publisher: printed for Francis Kirkman, and are to be sold by him and Thomas Dring the younger, at the White-Lyon next Chancery-lane in Fleet street,
